Name: [Affinity] Frosty Eviction
Desc: In specific areas of Hollow Zero, there's a chance to trigger special events for agents in the squad, activating specific Mindscapes for the Agent for the current round.
Desc2: Lycaon is as elegant as always, but he has a particularly relentless look in his eye. Any uninvited guest would be met with a cold kick out the front door before they got the chance to say a thing.
